Coerce mgNetworksCollection or mgNetwork objects to igraph objects.

Source: R/as.igraph.R
as.igraph.Rd

Coerce mgNetworksCollection or mgNetwork objects to igraph objects.

# S3 method for mgNetwork
as.igraph(x, ...)

# S3 method for mgNetworksCollection
as.igraph(x, ...)

Arguments

x

either a mgNetworksCollection or a mgNetwork object.
...

currently ignored.

Value

An object of class igraph for a mgNetwork object and a list of igraph objects for mgNetworksCollection.

Methods (by class)

  • mgNetwork: Convert mgNetwork objects to igraph objects.

  • mgNetworksCollection: Convert mgNetworksCollection objects to a list of igraph objects.
